channel.title: SMF 99 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 99 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - c_vcm_srb_flags
item.description: For IBM use only Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_SRB_FLAGS Description For IBM use only

item.title: Field - cec_capacity_used
item.description: CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPUSEDADJ Description CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - cec_capacity_used_ms
item.description: CEC capacity used in microseconds Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPUSED Description CEC capacity used in microseconds

item.title: Field - cec_free_capacity
item.description: Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPFREE Description Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - cec_utilization
item.description: Total CEC utilization, scaled by 256 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECUTIL Description Total CEC utilization, scaled by 256 Post-Processed The value is scaled by 25600.

item.title: Field - cpu_total
item.description: number of VH, VM and VL processors Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: cpu_vh, cpu_vm, cpu_vl Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return cpu_vh + cpu_vm + cpu_vl

item.title: Field - cpu_type
item.description: SMF99.12 capacity data processor type @ME14601A Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_int_cap_proctype Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 1 CP 2 zAAP 3 zIIP default No Processor

item.title: Field - cpu_vh
item.description: Number VHs Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPUHI Description Number VHs

item.title: Field - cpu_vl
item.description: Number VLs Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPULO Description Number VLs

item.title: Field - cpu_vm
item.description: Number of VMs Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CPUMED Description Number of VMs

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: Length of the data section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DLN Description Length of the data section

item.title: Field - dof
item.description: Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DOF Description Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - don
item.description: Number of data sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DON Description Number of data sections

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF. Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99DTE Description Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99FLG Description System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description stu 1 Subtypes utilized

item.title: Field - hd_action_explanation
item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_action_explanation = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.

item.title: Field - hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity
item.description: Less than 25% of CP free, no unparking Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: mvs_busy, vcm_mvsbusythrunpark, cec_free_capacity Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: condition1 = mvs_busy >= vcm_mvsbusythrunpark condition2 = cec_free_capacity <= (2e6 * vcm_mvsbusythrunpark / 1600) return condition1 & condition2

item.title: Field - hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl
Field - hd_action_park
item.description: Allow at least 2 VL that have effectiveness, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrefflowthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrefflowthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_capping
item.description: Allow at least 2 VL that have effectiveness, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used
item.description: Only 10% above guaranteed is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectsmall, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Only 10% above guaranteed is used. One VL is parked Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectsmall & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used
item.description: Only 4% above guaranteed capacity is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectnone, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Only 4% above guaranteed capacity is used. 50% of VLs are parked, at least one VL is parked Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectnone & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low
item.description: MVS busy threshold is low, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrbusythr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrbusythr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping
item.description: MVS busy threshold is low, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapbusythr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapbusythr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_small_utilization
item.description: Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecreffectthr, vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done, VH exists Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectthr & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping
item.description: Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done during capping Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr, vcm_diagdecrprsmcap, vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ Description Less than 20% of VM/VL capacity is used, parking done during capping, VH exists Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapeffectthr & vcm_diagdecrprsmcap & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and free capacity is available, unparking done Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_capping
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and free capacity is available, unparking done during capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrunusedcap, vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and not enough free capacity available. Partiotions white space is used, unparking done Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrunusedcap & vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping
item.description: MVS busy is higer than threshold, unparking done Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: vcm_diagincrunusedcap, vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil, vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark Description MVS busy is higer than threshold and not enough free capacity available. Partiotions white space is used, unparking done during capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagincrunusedcap & vcm_diagdecrprsmcapvhutil & vcm_diagincrdiscrunpark

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_length
item.description: Length of capacity data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_LENGTH Description Length of capacity data section

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_number
item.description: Number of capacity data sections Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_NUMBER Description Number of capacity data sections

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_offset
item.description: Offset to capacity data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_CAP_OFFSET Description Offset to capacity data section

item.title: Field - hd_int_cap_proctype
item.description: SMF99.12 capacity data processor type Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_HD_INT_CAP_PROCTYPE Description SMF99.12 capacity data processor type

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_length
item.description: Length of header data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_LENGTH Description Length of header data section

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_number
item.description: Number of header data sections Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_NUMBER Description Number of header data sections

item.title: Field - hd_int_hdr_offset
item.description: Offset to header data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_HDR_OFFSET Description Offset to header data section

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_idx
item.description: HiperDispatch interval processor index Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_HD_INT_PROC_IDX Description HiperDispatch interval processor index

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_length
item.description: Length of processor data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_LENGTH Description Length of processor data section

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_number
item.description: Number of processor data sections Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_NUMBER Description Number of processor data sections

item.title: Field - hd_int_proc_offset
item.description: Offset to processor data section Map: SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9912_HD_INT_PROC_OFFSET Description Offset to processor data section

item.title: Field - hd_request
item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_request = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_request = hd_request.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_request = hd_request.

item.title: Sample - hiper_dispatch
item.description: Request hiper dispatch information per processor type. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format vm_vl_cap_above_guaranteed processed SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPVMVLUSEDOVERGUARAN Percentage of guaranteed VM capacity used by VM + VL, scaled by 256 integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter). string vl_unparked SMF99C_VCM_CPULOUNPARKED Number of unparked VLs integer vcm_ceccaptotal SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPTOTAL Total CEC capacity in microseconds integer timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp vm_vl_capacity_of_allocated processed SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPVMVLUSEDOFALLOC Percentage used of allocated VM + VL capacity, scaled by 256 integer cpu_vl SMF99C_VCM_CPULO Number VLs integer lpar_busy_projected processed SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSYPROJECTED Projected MvsBusy, scaled by 16 integer vm_vl_allocated_capacity SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPALLOCVMVL Allocated LPAR capacity on VMs and VLs in microseconds integer lpar_capacity_used SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDADJ Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length integer mvs_busy processed SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSY Average CPU usage scaled by 16 integer lpar_capacity_guaranteed SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPGUARAN Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds.

item.title: Field - lccadsf2
item.description: Processor Flag 1 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_LCCADSF2 Description Processor Flag 1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lccapark 1 Processor parked

item.title: Field - lccapark
item.description: Processor parked Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: lccadsf2 Description Processor parked Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field lccadsf2.

item.title: Field - lccappnd
item.description: Processor park request pending Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: lccascfl Description Processor park request pending Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field lccascfl.

item.title: Field - lccascfl
item.description: Processor Flag 2 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Based on: SMF99C_LCCASCFL Description Processor Flag 2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lccappnd 7 Processor park request pending

item.title: Field - len
item.description: Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word). Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99LEN Description Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word).

item.title: Field - lpar_busy
item.description: Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inte… Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: lpar_capacity_used, cpu_total Description Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return lpar_capacity_used / cpu_total / 20000

item.title: Field - lpar_busy_projected
item.description: Projected MvsBusy, scaled by 16 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSYPROJECTED Description Projected MvsBusy, scaled by 16 Post-Processed The value is scaled by 16.

item.title: Field - lpar_cap_used_non_guaranteed
item.description: Used capacity of the non-guaranteed capacity (partially VM and unparked VLs) in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDDISCR Description Used capacity of the non-guaranteed capacity (partially VM and unparked VLs) in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_allocated
item.description: Allocated LPAR capcacity in microseconds. The allocated capacity is provided by the guaranteed capacity on VHs and VMs, plus extra capacity on VMs and unparked VLs Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPALLOC Description Allocated LPAR capcacity in microseconds. The allocated capacity is provided by the guaranteed capacity on VHs and VMs, plus extra capacity on VMs and unparked VLs

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_guaranteed
item.description: Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds. This value is calculated from the physical processor share of this LPAR. Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPGUARAN Description Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds. This value is calculated from the physical processor share of this LPAR.

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_guaranteed_vm
item.description: Guaranteed LPAR capacity on VMs in microseconds Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPMEDGUARAN Description Guaranteed LPAR capacity on VMs in microseconds

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_non_guaranteed
item.description: Non guaranteed LPAR capacity in microseconds Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPNONGUARAN Description Non guaranteed LPAR capacity in microseconds

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_share_unused
item.description: Unused capacity share for this LPAR in microseconds Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARUNUSEDCAPSHARE Description Unused capacity share for this LPAR in microseconds

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_unused
item.description: Unused LPAR capacity in microseconds, including the unused capacity share for this LPAR Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARUNUSEDCAP Description Unused LPAR capacity in microseconds, including the unused capacity share for this LPAR

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used
item.description: Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDADJ Description Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used_vh
item.description: Used VH capacity of previous interval in microseconds Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDVHADJ Description Used VH capacity of previous interval in microseconds

item.title: Field - lpar_capacity_used_vm_vl
item.description: Used capacity on VMs and VLs, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPUSEDVMVL Description Used capacity on VMs and VLs, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - mt_badrv_ready_for_mt
item.description: HiperDispatch is now ready for MT mode switches Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag1 Description HiperDispatch is now ready for MT mode switches Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field mt_flag1.

item.title: Field - mt_cf
item.description: Capacity factor of processor class. Scaled by 1024 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_CF Description Capacity factor of processor class. Scaled by 1024

item.title: Field - mt_curr
item.description: MT mode currently in use Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_CURR Description MT mode currently in use

item.title: Field - mt_flag1
item.description: 1st MT flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_FLAG1 Description 1st MT flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description mt_procascore 0 Processor resource is viewed as a CPU core mt_multicpuspercore 1 Multiple CPUs defined within a CPU Core mt_badrv_ready_for_mt 4 HiperDispatch is now ready for MT mode switches

item.title: Field - mt_flag2
item.description: 2nd MT flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_FLAG2 Description 2nd MT flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description mt_modechgduetostsi_pend 0 MT mode change is pending due to STSI mt_sup_recovery_pend 1 The supervisor requested MT reconfiguration is pending mt_modechgduetohismt_pend 2 MT mode change is pending due to HISMT recovery mt_modechgduetowaitcmp_pend 3 MT mode change is pending due to Wait completion status change mt_modechgduetosupmt1_pend 4 MT mode change is pending due to supervisor request

item.title: Field - mt_mcf
item.description: Maximum capacity factor of processor class. Scaled by 1024 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_MT_MCF Description Maximum capacity factor of processor class. Scaled by 1024

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetohismt_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to HISMT recovery Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Description MT mode change is pending due to HISMT recovery Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetostsi_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to STSI Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Description MT mode change is pending due to STSI Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetosupmt1_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to supervisor request Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Description MT mode change is pending due to supervisor request Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_modechgduetowaitcmp_pend
item.description: MT mode change is pending due to Wait completion status change Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag2 Description MT mode change is pending due to Wait completion status change Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field mt_flag2.

item.title: Field - mt_multicpuspercore
item.description: Multiple CPUs defined within a CPU Core Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: mt_flag1 Description Multiple CPUs defined within a CPU Core Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field mt_flag1.

item.title: Field - mt_opt_inuse

item.description: Record flags Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PFLG Description Record flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description record_incomplete 0 Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte reasm_indicator 1 Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area.

item.title: Field - vcm_diagcapdecr
item.description: Capacity decrease flags Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_DIAGCAPDECR Description Capacity decrease flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_diagdecr 0 Adjust capacity decrease vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark 1 Adjust capacity decrease by parking a processor vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ 2 Park requested vcm_diagdecrdiscrpaallrq 3 Park all request vcm_diagdecrbusythr 4 MvsBusy too low vcm_diagdecreffectthr 5 VL effect too low vcm_diagdecreffectsmall 6 small VM/VL effectiveness vcm_diagdecreffectnone 7 no VM/VL effectiveness vcm_diagdecrefflowthr 8 if no VH exists vcm_diagnodecrlowutil 9 No capacity decrease adjustment.

item.title: Field - vcm_diagcapdecr_cont

Free capacity unpark threshold at or above upper limit vcm_diagnodecrprsmcaplowutil 1 PR/SM capped LPAR: No capacity decrease adjustment. Reason: Low CEC utilization

item.title: Field - vcm_diagcapincr

item.title: Field - vcm_flag1
item.description: HD 1st flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG1 Description HD 1st flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_topochanged 0 topology has changed vcm_rebuildans 1 rebuild affinity nodes vcm_topochg_hp 2 honor priority has changed vcm_topochg_wuqe 3 dispatcher WUQ error vcm_procspeedchg 4 processor speed change

item.title: Field - vcm_flag2
item.description: HD 2nd flag byte Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_FLAG2 Description HD 2nd flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_ceccapvalid 0 CEC capacities are valid vcm_lparcapvalid 1 LPAR capacities are valid vcm_old_state 2 old VCM state vcm_mpwq_updated 4 dispatcher affinity was updated vcm_ptf_switched 5 PTF was issued to initiate a switch into the opposite mode. However, the PTF return info tells us that we are already in the requested mode vcm_transition 6 VCM is transitioning to/from vertical

item.title: Field - vcm_lparflags
item.description: LPAR Status Flags Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARFLAGS Description LPAR Status Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_lparcpshareok 0 The physical CPU/Core share matches the number and polarization of the CPUs/Cores passed by the topology information vcm_lparcpsharehi 1 The physical CPU/Core share is higher than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info vcm_lparcpsharelo 2 The physical CPU/Core share is lower than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info
